title: Episode 1
description:
Thanks for tuning in to Bros With a Bible, our new weekly Bible podcast! New episodes will be posted on Sunday at around 4-8 PM EDT.

Today, Kayne is reading in Job 15 and Rocco is reading Hebrews 2 1-10.

Psalms 119:105
"Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path"

title: Episode 2
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne continues in Job 22 and Rocco continues reading in Hebrews 3.

Colossians 3:16
"Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord."

title: Episode 3
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne continues in Job 29 and Rocco continues in Hebrews 4 11-13.

Psalm 19:7
"The law of the Lord is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the Lord is sure, making wise the simple."

title: Episode 4
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne continues in Job 35 and Rocco continues in Hebrews 6:13-16.

Proverbs 2:6
"For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding."

title: Episode 5
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne continues in Job 42 and Rocco continues in Hebrews 9:11-15.

Hebrews 4:12
"For the word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit, and of the joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart."

title: Episode 6
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne reads in Jonah/Joel and Rocco continues in Hebrews 10:26-31.

Romans 15:13 
"Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost."

title: Episode 7
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne reads in Mark 6 and Rocco continues in Hebrews 11:28-40.

Matthew 6:33 
 "But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you."

title: Episode 8
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne gives Biblical advice on how to deal with addiction (as requested by a listener) and Rocco continues in Hebrews 13:1-6. 

Psalm 34:17
"The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles."

-- Remember that you are never alone. God is always with you. We love you and God loves you :) --

title: Episode 9
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

Today, Kayne goes in depth about the importance of Palm Sunday (Matthew 21:1-11) and Rocco continues in James 2:8-13.1 

Peter 5:7
"Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you."

title: Episode 10
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! Happy Easter!

Today, Kayne continues in Esther 1-5 and Rocco covers the story of Jesus' resurrection (John 20).

Matthew 28:6
"He is not here: for he is risen, as he said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay."

title: Episode 11
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! We have a special guest today, Kevin!

Today, Kayne continues in Esther 6-10, Rocco continues in James 2:14-26, and Kevin shares some encouraging words.

Matthew 11:28
 "Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest."

*Sorry for the late episode. We got busy yesterday and forgot to upload! Also, there is a cut about 23 minutes in. This wasn't intentional as it was a technical issue. The episode continues right where it left off.*

title: Episode 12
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast!

title: Episode 13
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! We have a special guest today, Rick! Also, Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers out there!

Today, Kayne continues in Daniel 6, Rocco continues in 1 Peter 2, and Rick reads in Matthew 8.

Proverbs 31:25-26
"Strength and honour are her clothing; and she shall rejoice in time to come. She openeth her mouth with wisdom; and in her tongue is the law of kindness."

title: Episode 14
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! (The actual episode ends at 27:35. There's some infomercial bloopers at the end!)

Today, Kayne continues in Hosea 5-6 and Rocco continues in 1 Peter 3:1-7.

"Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature."

description:

1 Peter 4:1-7.

description:

description:

 Today, Kayne continues in Ruth and Rocco continues in 2 Peter 3:8-10.

description:

Today, Kayne continues in 1 Kings 17:8-16, Rocco continues in 1 John 1:5-10, and Brady talks about Barabbas from the New Testament.

1 John 3:1
"Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God..."

description:

Today, Kayne continues in Ecclesiastes 3, Rocco continues in 1 John 2:1-6, and Shannon reads from Mark 14 and shares some thoughts.

title: Episode 19
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! The audio cuts out at 18:18 due to technical difficulties with the recording. Thank you Rick for the assistance with getting things back up and running!

title: Episode 22
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! Please welcome special guest, Colby, to the podcast!

Today, Kayne continues in Song of Solomon ch. 3, Rocco continues in 3 John vs. 9-10, and Colby talks about forgiveness.

"If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness."

title: Episode 23
description:

Today, Kayne continues in Psalms 27, Rocco continues in Jude vs. 17-23, and Colby teaches us how to have faith over fear.

1 Timothy 1:7"For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind."

title: Episode 25.5
description:

title: Episode 26
description:
Thanks for tuning in again to Bros With a Bible, our weekly Bible podcast! Thank you all for an incredible 6 months of weekly episodes!

Our thoughts and prayers are with the McCain Family and the Spring Garden Community after the tragedy they've faced in the past week.

Today, Kayne continues in 1 Samuel 3 and Rocco continues in Revelation 8:1-5.1 

Corinthians 16:14
"Let all your things be done with charity."
